pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, March 16, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, March 16, 2017:

New York City, United States of America

Personal

Media appearances

An interview with CBC Newfoundland & Labrador will air on Thursday morning on CBC Radio One (World Report) and on CBC News Network throughout the morning. A news item will also air on The National.

An interview with Tom Brokaw will air on NBC’s Today Show between 8:00 am. and 8:30 a.m. ET and on NBC’s Nightly News between 6:30 p.m. and 7:00 p.m. ET.
